articles.description: Max Verstappen edges out Lando Norris by just 0.093 seconds to take pole position for the sprint race at the Austrian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Austrian GP: Max Verstappen on sprint pole

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu is drawn against Russian 22nd seed Ekaterina Alexandrova in the first round of Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 draw: Emma Raducanu and Katie Boulter find out opponents

articles.description: Ben Stokes backs Jos Buttler to remain as England white-ball captain, despite the heavy defeat by India in the T20 World Cup semi-final.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Ben Stokes backs Jos Buttler to remain England white-ball captain

articles.description: World number one Nelly Korda pulls out of the Aramco Team Series event in Hemel Hempstead after being bitten by a dog.
articles.title: Nelly Korda: World number one withdraws from Aramco Team Series after dog bite

articles.description: BBC Sport's football expert Chris Sutton gives his predictions for the last-16 ties at Euro 2024, including England against Slovakia.
articles.title: Chris Sutton's predictions - Euro 2024 last-16 ties

articles.description: Virgil van Dijk and the Netherlands faced flak after defeat to Austria, and the captain says "harsh words" have been spoken among the squad.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Virgil van Dijk says Netherlands 'maybe overestimate ourselves'

articles.description: Antonin Panenka's penalty in the Euro 1976 final birthed a whole new 12-yard tactic. But the risks were higher than anyone could imagine.
articles.title: Antonin Panenka: The Euro 1976 penalty that killed a career and birthed a feud

articles.description: We have read, watched and listened to what English pundits and media think of the Three Lions at Euro 2024, but how does the rest of Europe view them?
articles.title: Kane in crisis, toxic pressure - what Europe thinks of England at Euro 2024

articles.description: Injured MMA star Conor McGregor says watching UFC 303 fight week go on without him is painful.
articles.title: UFC 303: Conor McGregor in 'pain' to watch fight week go on without him

articles.description: The US Soccer Federation condemns the online racial abuse suffered by many of its players following a 2-1 defeat by Panama.
articles.title: Copa America: USA 1-2 Panama - Timothy Weah suffers racist abuse after red card
